https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/d0FXHPG3AfNG2G56fngH98i2iQU.jpg Massively affected by the big city, Baddi, a janitor in the morgue, makes phone calls to the yet-to-be-informed widows in an attempt to meet the one that will fulfill his fantasy of love, wealth and social status. Are You Feeling Lonely?
